songs.title: Qué Amor (What A Love)
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Ohhhh, whoa whoa whooo
You make me feel so glad
I know you will love me forever
I know you'll never make me sad

[Verse]
Be sure I'm in your mind
Be happy and don't cry
If I love you and you love me too
Our love will last, is written in the sand
Please tell me, dear
That you love me
I hear and again and again
YEAH!

[Chorus]
Oh, whoa whoa whooo
You make me feel so glad
I know you will love me forever
I know you'll  never make me sad

[Solo]

[Chorus]
I know you will love me forever
I know you'll never make me sad

[Bridge]
Please tell me, dear
That you love me
I hear and again and again
Yah!

[Chorus]
Oh, whoa whoa whooo
You make me feel so glad
I know you will love me forever
I know you'll  never make me sad
